title: Recent Republic Acts (Latest 10)
excerpt: Key legislation signed into law recently.
content:
1. RA 11962 - Trabaho Para sa Bayan Act
Establishes a master plan for employment generation and recovery.

2. RA 11961 - Cultural Mapping Law
Strengthens the protection and conservation of Philippine cultural heritage.

3. RA 11960 - OTOP Philippines Act
Institutionalizes the 'One Town, One Product' program to support MSMEs.

4. RA 11959 - Regional Specialty Centers Act
Mandates the establishment of specialty healthcare centers in DOH hospitals nationwide.

5. RA 11958 - Automatic Income Classification of LGUs Act
Provides a more responsive system for classifying provinces, cities, and municipalities.

6. RA 11956 - Estate Tax Amnesty Extension
Extends the period of availing estate tax amnesty by two years.

7. RA 11954 - Maharlika Investment Fund Act of 2023
Establishes the Philippines' first sovereign wealth fund.

8. RA 11953 - New Agrarian Emancipation Act
Condoning all loans, including interests and penalties, of agrarian reform beneficiaries.

9. RA 11939 - AFP Fixed Term Act
Amends the fixed terms of key officers in the Armed Forces of the Philippines.

10. RA 11934 - SIM Registration Act
Mandates the registration of Subscriber Identity Modules (SIMs) to curb cybercrime.
